content.prompt: Which of the following best explains the photographer’s choice of composition and subject in image 2 ?

choices.label: He wished to show the benefits of Britain’s national health-care system to audiences that were increasingly critical of it.
He hoped to demonstrate the multiethnic character of Britain to audiences who were fearful of immigration from former colonies.
He wanted to show the despair and poor conditions of the people who relied on the welfare state.
He desired to support Thatcher’s Conservative government, which promised to cut welfare benefits.

skill.text: Skill 2.C: Explain the significance of a source's point of view, purpose, historical situation, and/or audience, including how these might limit the use(s) of a source.
